title: LFT Pool Party Event Unranked New Players Wanted
body: Hello everybody! With pool party week starting, I am looking into getting in on the prizes. I am a level 17 summoner under the summoner name Oaklandish. I am looking for unranked players like myself to make a team of five in normal blind pick games. I enjoy mid, adc, and support, but am willing to go jg and top. Post down below if you are interested and send me a frind request! :) Sorry if Im posting in the wrong spot or doing something wrong in my forum post as I am new to the forums. I hope I can find a team compiled of newer players such as myself that also want to have a good time. :) {{champion:74}}

replies.body: Yo, I'm level 30. Trust me, I'm not particularly skilled. I can play anything but ADC.

I'm interested too level 30 but haven't played any ranked games. I like any role, but probably have the most trouble with jungle. I am on usually later at night though I sometimes play at day time. Add me if you want I always accept requests when I am on

You are not the only one who wants some of these prizes (that is also unranked).
I am a level 23 player I main Support, I can play Top and Jungle. Though I do need to get better. :)
MGAMIKA (on OCE) -.-

I can play {{champion:201}}{{champion:114}}  {{champion:41}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:16}} 
However my two mains (One jungle and One support are {{champion:5}} {{champion:37}} GP is my top main )
